channel.title: What special should I add next?
channel.description:

item.title: What special should I add next?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Well I just wanted to use the same projectiles as Dark Bow and have it hit twice correctly with the animations lawl…

I’ve gotten the projectiles and the double hits down… I just need help with the animations

Can one of you guys help me like give me your msn?

Read full topic
item.source: What special should I add next?

item.title: What special should I add next?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“iceman327, post:20, topic:167665”]I used the same thing I did for my Dds special to hit twice
and my Dark bow to hit twice, but theres just something wacked with the animation

All I need to do is fix the second hit to make it like do the animation that shoots twice.

you know what I mean?[/quote]

well see… the dds spec has a special animation for hitting twice… and if you use the mage short special animation then the dark bow has an animation for hitting twice… xbox does not im pretty sure, so it will be hard to have it hit twice unless you know how to speed up animations or possibly use the mage shortbow animation, but im not sure how that would look lol.

ps i voted rune claws cuz the others are too easy

Read full topic
item.source: What special should I add next?

item.title: What special should I add next?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

I used the same thing I did for my Dds special to hit twice
and my Dark bow to hit twice, but theres just something wacked with the animation

All I need to do is fix the second hit to make it like do the animation that shoots twice.

you know what I mean?

Read full topic

item.title: What special should I add next?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

Lol, Karil’s crossbow special?

Yeah it was a crazy idea,
but I’m having a few problems.

The problem is after it does the karils cross bow emote once,
on the second hit it just punches, but still shows the gfx and double hits…

Idk how to fix it… Can you?

Read full topic
item.source: What special should I add next?

item.title: What special should I add next?
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:16, topic:167665”]Well, there aren’t really any “meh” specials. There are just working ones and non working ones.
All of these work, of course.[/quote]

by meh i mean so-so… most people’s specials are crap. these i would consider great quality but not extremely good unless the effects work properly

Read full topic
